pilots.ability: When you reveal a bank maneuver, you may rotate your dial to the other bank maneuver of the same speed.
When attacking a ship inside your auxiliary firing arc, roll 1 additional attack die.
When attacking with a secondary weapon, you may reroll 1 attack die.
During your Perform Action step, you may perform 2 actions.
When your attack deals a faceup Damage card to the defender, instead draw 3 Damage cards, choose 1 to deal, and discard the others.
At the start of the Combat phase, you may acquire a target lock on an enemy ship at Range 1.
When you reveal your maneuver, you may increase or decrease its speed by 1 (to a minimum of 1).
At the start of the End phase, you may spend a target lock you have on an enemy ship to flip 1 random facedown Damage card assigned to it faceup.
When attacking with a secondary weapon, if you are inside the defender's firing arc, you may reroll your blank results.
While a friendly ship at Range 1 is performing an attack with a primary weapon, it may reroll 1 attack die.
When attacking a ship outside your firing arc, roll 1 additional attack die.
When defending, ships attacking you cannot spend focus tokens or reroll attack dice.
After you perform an attack at Range 1 that hits, assign 1 damage to the defender.
After executing a green maneuver, you may perform a free focus action.
When attacking a defender that has 1 or more Damage cards, roll 1 additional attack die.
When attacking, you may spend your target lock on the defender to deal 1 damage. Then cancel all dice results.
When attacking at Range 1, you may change 1 of your hit results to a critical result.
After being dealt a Damage card, if you have 2 or fewer Damage cards, flip that Damage card facedown.
When attacking, if you are the only ship attacking the defender, roll 1 additional attack die.
When defending, you may change 1 of your focus results to an evade result.
When attacking, reduce the defender's agility value by 1 (to a minimum of 0).
Other friendly ships at Range 1 cannot be targeted by attacks if the attacker could target you instead.
After spending a focus token, you may place that token on any other friendly ship at Range 1-2.
When you receive a stress token, you may remove it and roll 1 attack die. On a hit result, deal 1 facedown Damage card to this ship.
When an enemy ship declares you as the target of an attack, you may acquire a target lock on that ship.
After you perform an attack, you may remove 1 focus, evade, or blue target lock token from the defender.
When you acquire or spend a target lock, you may remove 1 stress token from your ship.
After acquiring a target lock, choose another friendly ship at Range 1-2. That ship may immediately acquire a target lock.
When attacking at Range 2-3, you may reroll any of your blank results.
You may perform actions even while you have stress tokens.
After performing a focus action, you may perform a free boost or barrel roll action.
You may declare an enemy ship inside your firing arc that you are touching as the target of your attack.
While you are at Range 1 of at least 1 enemy ship, increase your agility value by 1.
When attacking a ship outside your firing arc, roll 1 additional attack die.
When a friendly ship at Range 1-3 attacks a ship you have locked, the friendly ship may treat your target lock as its own.
When attacking, if there are no other friendly ships at Range 1-2, roll 1 additional attack die.
At the start of the Combat phase, you may remove 1 focus or evade token from another friendly ship at Range 1-2 and assign it to yourself.
You have the pilot skill and pilot ability of the friendly Hound's Tooth (fore section), if it is in play.
When you reveal a bank maneuver, you may rotate your dial to the other bank maneuver of the same speed.
When attacking a ship inside your auxiliary firing arc, roll 1 additional attack die.
When dropping a bomb, you may use the [3 straight] template instead of the [1 straight] template.
When the number of Damage cards assigned to you equals or exceeds your hull value, you are not destroyed until the end of the Combat phase.
After you perform an attack, you may perform a free boost or barrel roll action.
When you receive a stress token, you may assign 1 focus token to your ship.
When you are dealt a faceup Damage card, immediately flip it facedown (without resolving its ability).
After you execute a green maneuver, choose 1 other friendly ship at Range 1.  That ship may perform 1 free action shown on its action bar.
When attacking, you may reroll all of your dice. If you choose to do so, you must reroll as many of your dice as possible.
When attacking, 1 of your [Critical Hit] results cannot be canceled by defense dice.
When attacking or defending, if you have at least 1 stress token, you may reroll 1 of your dice.
At the start of the Combat phase, choose 1 other friendly ship at Range 1-3.  Until the end of the phase, treat that ship's pilot skill value as "12."
At the start of the Combat phase, you may assign 1 of your focus tokens to another friendly ship at Range 1-3.
When another friendly ship at Range 1-3 is attacking, if you have no stress tokens, you may receive 1 stress token to allow that ship to roll 1 additional attack die.
When another friendly ship at Range 1 attacks with a secondary weapon, it may reroll up to 2 attack dice.
When attacking with a secondary weapon, you may increase or decrease the weapon range by 1 to a limit of Range 1-3.
When an enemy ship acquires a target lock, it must lock onto your ship if able.
At the start of the Combat phase, you may assign 1 of your blue target lock tokens to a friendly ship at Range 1 if it does not have a blue target lock token.
When another friendly ship at Range 1-2 would receive a stress token, if you have 2 or fewer stress tokens, you may receive that token instead.
When performing a barrel roll action, you may receive 1 stress token to use the ([Bank Left] 1) or ([Bank Right] 1) template instead of the ([Straight] 1) template.
When you reveal a [Koiogran Turn] maneuver, you may treat the speed of that maneuver as "1," "3," or "5".
When attacking at Range 2-3, you may spend 1 evade token to add 1 [Hit] result to your roll.
Enemy ships at Range 1 cannot perform focus or evade actions and cannot spend focus or evade tokens.
When attacking, the defender is hit by your attack, even if he does not suffer any damage.
After you perform an attack, you may choose another friendly ship at Range 1.  That ship may perform 1 free action.
When attacking, immediately after you roll attack dice, you may acquire a target lock on the defender if it already has a red target lock token.
After you perform an attack that deals at least 1 Damage card to the defender, you may spend a focus token to flip those cards faceup.
When an enemy ship inside your firing arc at Range 1-3 is defending, the attacker may change 1 of its [Hit] results to a [Critical Hit] result.
At the start of the End phase, you may perform one attack. You cannot attack during the next round.
When you decloak, you must use the ([Bank Left] 2) or ([Bank Right] 2) template instead of the ([Straight] 2) template.
After you perform an attack that hits, you may assign 1 focus token to your ship.
When attacking with your primary weapon, you may spend 1 energy to roll 1 additional attack die.
When attacking, you may remove 1 stress token to change all of your [Focus] results to [Hit] results.
You can perform [Torpedo] secondary weapon attacks against enemy ships outside your firing arc.
You may ignore obstacles during the Activation phase and when performing actions.
When attacking at Range 1-2, you may change one of your [Focus] results to a [Critical Hit] result.
After executing a maneuver, each enemy ship you are touching suffers 1 damage.
When you are dealt a faceup Damage card, draw 1 additional Damage card, choose 1 to resolve, and discard the other.
When performing a primary weapon attack against a stressed ship, roll 1 additional attack die.
If you have no shields and at least 1 Damage card assigned to you, increase your agility value by 1.
When defending, a friendly ship at Range 1 may suffer 1 uncanceled [Hit] or [Critical Hit] result instead of you.
When another friendly ship at Range 1 is defending it may reroll 1 defense die.
After you perform an attack that destroys the defender, you may recover 1 shield.
Once per round, after you perform an attack that does not hit, you may perform an attack with an equipped [Cannon] secondary weapon.
After you perform a boost action, you may perform a free evade action.
You may execute the ([Segnor's Loop Left] 3) or ([Segnor's Loop Right] 3) maneuver using the corresponding ([Turn Left] 3) or ([Turn Right] 3) template.
When an enemy ship at Range 1-3 receives at least 1 ion token, if you are not stressed, you may receive 1 stress token to cause that ship to suffer 1 damage.
At the start of the Combat phase, you may remove 1 focus or evade token from an enemy ship at Range 1-2 and assign it to yourself.
At the end of the Activation phase, choose 1 enemy ship at Range 1-2. Until the end of the Combat phase, treat that ship's pilot skill value as "0".
At the start of the Combat phase, if you are at Range 1 of an enemy ship, you may assign 1 focus token to your ship.
After you defend against an attack, if the attack did not hit, you may assign 1 evade token to your ship.
Once per round, after you perform a primary weapon attack, you may spend 2 energy to perform another primary weapon attack.
When a friendly ship declares an attack, you may spend a target lock you have on the defender to reduce its agility by 1 for that attack.
When you perform an attack that hits, before dealing damage, you may cancel 1 of your [Critical Hit] results to add 2 [Hit] results.
You have the pilot skill and pilot ability of the friendly destroyed ship equipped with the Hound's Tooth Upgrade card.
When defending, if the attacker is inside your firing arc, roll 1 additional defense die.
When attacking or defending, double the effect of your range combat bonuses.
When another friendly ship at Range 1-2 is attacking, it may treat your focus tokens as its own.
Once per round when attacking, you may either spend 1 shield to roll 1 additional attack die or roll 1 fewer attack die to recover 1 shield.
You may maintain 2 target locks on the same ship. When you acquire a target lock, you may acquire a second lock on that same ship.
When dropping a bomb, you may use the front guides of your ship. After dropping a bomb, you may perform a free barrel roll action.
You can perform [Cannon] secondary weapon attacks against ships inside your auxiliary firing arc.
At the start of the Combat phase, remove 1 stress token from each friendly ship at Range 1.
When attacking, you may spend a focus token and a target lock you have on the defender to change all of your results to [Critical Hit] results.
Enemy ships that you have locked cannot modify any dice when attacking you or defending against your attacks.
When performing a barrel roll, you may use the ([Straight] 2) template (instead of the ([Straight] 1) template).
While attacking or defending, if you have a focus token, you may change 1 of your [Focus] results to a [Hit] or [Evade] result.
The first time you remove a shield token from your ship each round, assign 1 evade token to your ship.
When performing a boost action, you may use the ([Turn Left] 1) or ([Turn Right] 1) template.
When you reveal a green or red maneuver, you may rotate your dial to another maneuver of the same difficulty.
Once per round after defending, if the attacker is inside your firing arc, you may perform an attack against that ship.
When attacking you may roll 1 additional attack die. If you do, the defender rolls 1 additional defense die.
When attacking with your primary weapon at Range 2-3, treat the range of the attack as Range 1.
After you execute a maneuver, you may deploy up to 2 docked ships.
When defending, if you are stressed, you may change up to 2 of your [Focus] results to [Evade] results.
While you do not have any Damage cards, treat your pilot skill value as "12."
When attacking, if you are not stressed, you may receive 1 stress token to roll 1 additional attack die.
At the start of the Combat phase, each enemy ship you are touching receives 1 stress token.
When an enemy ship at Range 1-2 is attacking, you may spend a focus token. If you do, the attacker rolls 1 fewer attack die.
When you reveal a green or red maneuver, you may rotate your dial to another maneuver of the same difficulty.
Immediately before you reveal your maneuver, you may perform a free boost or barrel roll action.
When defending, you may cancel [Critical Hit] results before [Hit] results.
Once per round, after you discard an [Elite] Upgrade card, flip that card faceup.
While you are not stressed, you may treat your [Tallon Roll Left] and [Tallon Roll Right] maneuvers as white maneuvers.
After defending, you may perform a free action.
At the start of the End phase, you may assign 1 of your stress tokens to another ship at Range 1.
At the start of the Combat phase, you may assign all focus, evade, and target lock tokens assigned to you to another friendly ship at Range 1.
The first time you would be destroyed, instead cancel any remaining damage, discard all Damage cards, and deal 4 facedown Damage cards to this ship.
When you reveal your maneuver dial or after you perform an action, you may perform a [Bomb] Upgrade card action as a free action.
When your attack deals a faceup Damage card to the defender, instead draw 3 Damage cards, choose 1 to deal, and discard the others.
When you reveal a [Straight] maneuver, you may treat it as a [Koiogran Turn] maneuver.
While attacking or defending, if you have a focus token, you may change 1 of your [Focus] results to a [Hit] or [Evade] result.
When attacking or defending, if the enemy ship is inside your firing arc, you may reroll up to 2 of your blank results.
When another friendly ship at Range 1-2 is attacking, it may treat your blue target lock tokens as its own.
When attacking or defending, if the enemy is at Range 1, you may roll 1 additional die.
When defending against an enemy ship inside your mobile firing arc at Range 1-2, you may add 1 [Focus] result to your roll.
Once per round, when you lose a shield token, you may perform a primary weapon attack.
At the start of the Combat phase, you may choose a ship at Range 1. If it is inside your primary and mobile firing arcs, assign 1 tractor beam token to it.
After you execute a maneuver, you may roll an attack die. On a [Hit] or [Critical Hit] result, remove 1 stress token from your ship.
After an enemy ship inside your firing arc at Range 1-3 attacks another friendly ship, you may perform a free action.
When attacking or defending, you may spend a target lock you have on the enemy ship to add 1 [Focus] result to your roll.
When attacking a ship inside your auxiliary firing arc, you may add 1 [Critical Hit] result.
After you execute a red maneuver, assign 2 focus tokens to your ship.
At the start of the Combat phase, you may choose 1 enemy ship at Range 1. If you are inside its firing arc, it discards all focus and evade tokens.
At the start of the Combat phase, you may choose a ship at Range 1-2. If it is inside your mobile firing arc, assign 1 stress token to it.
Immediately before you reveal your maneuver, you may perform a free boost or barrel roll action.
The first time you are hit by an attack each round, assign the "I'll Show You the Dark Side" Condition card to the defender.
At the end of the Activation phase, you must assign a tractor beam token to each ship you are touching.
At the start of the Activation phase, you may remove 1 stress token from 1 other friendly ship at Range 1-2.
While you have the "Adaptive Ailerons" Upgrade card equipped, you may choose to ignore its card ability.
When you are placed during setup, you can be placed anywhere in the play area beyond Range 3 of enemy ships.
After another friendly ship at Range 1-3 is destroyed (but has not fled the battlefield), you may perform an attack.
When attacking or defending, you may reroll 1 of your dice for each other friendly ship at Range 1.
When you receive a stress token, if there is an enemy ship inside your firing arc at Range 1, you may discard that stress token.
After you execute a 2-, 3-, or 4-speed maneuver, if you are not touching a ship, you may perform a free boost action.
At the start of the Combat phase, you may spend 1 focus token to choose a friendly ship at Range 1. It may perform 1 free action.
After you perform an attack, assign the "Suppressive Fire" Condition card to the defender.
For the purpose of your actions and Upgrade cards, you may treat friendly ships at Range 2-3 as being at Range 1.
During setup, friendly ships may be placed anywhere in the play area at Range 1-2 of you.
When a friendly ship acquires a target lock, that ship can lock onto an enemy ship at Range 1-3 of any friendly ship.
After an enemy ship executes a maneuver that causes it to overlap your ship, you may perform a free action.
When you reveal a reverse maneuver, you may drop a bomb using your front guides (including a bomb with the "Action:" header).
When defending, if you are not stressed, during the "Compare Results" step, you may suffer 1 damage to cancel all dice results. If you do, receive 1 stress token.
When attacking, if you have 1 or fewer Damage cards, roll 1 additional attack die.
When defending, you may cancel [Critical Hit] results before [Hit] results.
When defending, instead of using your agility value, you may roll a number of defense dice equal to the speed of the maneuver you executed this round.
After you acquire a target lock, assign focus and evade tokens to your ship until you have the same number of each token as the locked ship.
When attacking or defending, you may spend 1 shield to reroll any number of your dice.
At the start of the Combat phase, you may receive a weapons disabled token to flip one of your discarded [Torpedo] or [Missile] Upgrade cards faceup.
Once per round, after you roll or reroll dice, if you have the same result on each of your dice, you may add 1 matching result.
When attacking, you may spend 1 focus token to cancel all of the defender's blank and [Focus] results.
Once per round, after you perform a secondary weapon attack that does not hit, you may perform an attack with a different weapon.
After defending, if you did not roll exactly 2 defense dice, the attacker receives 1 stress token.
When another friendly ship at Range 1 is defending, you may spend 1 reinforce token. If you do, the defender adds 1 [Evade] result.
When attacking, if you have no shields and at least 1 Damage card assigned to you, roll 1 additional attack die.
You may ignore friendly bombs. When a friendly ship is defending, if the attacker measures range through a friendly bomb token, the defender may add 1 [Evade] result.
Once per round, you may prevent a friendly bomb from detonating.
When dropping a bomb, you may use the ([Turn Left] 1) or ([Turn Right] 1) template instead of the ([Straight] 1) template.

If you are not stressed, when you reveal a turn, bank, or Segnor's Loop maneuver, you may instead treat it as a red Tallon Roll maneuver of the same direction (left or right) using the template of the original revealed maneuver.
During setup, before the "Place Forces" step, you may choose 1 enemy ship and assign the "Shadowed" or "Mimicked" Condition card to it.
Once per round, after an enemy ship that is not defending from an attack suffers damage, you may perform an attack against that ship.
When defending, if you have a weapons disabled token, roll 1 additional defense die.
After you perform an attack, each enemy ship inside your bullseye firing arc at Range 1-3 must choose to suffer 1 damage or remove all of its focus and evade tokens.

When an enemy ship inside your firing arc at Range 1-3 becomes the active ship during the Combat phase, if you are not stressed, you may receive 1 stress token. If you do, that ship cannot spend tokens to modify its dice when attacking this round.
The first time you are hit by an attack each round, assign the "I'll Show You the Dark Side" Condition card to the defender.
When attacking, if the defender is inside your firing arc, you may spend 1 [Hit] or [Critical Hit] result to assign the "Rattled" Condition to the defender.
When you receive a weapons disabled token, if you are not stressed, you may receive 1 stress token to remove it.
At the start of the Combat phase, you may acquire a target lock on an enemy ship inside your bullseye firing arc at Range 1-3.
When defending, if you are stressed, you may change up to 2 of your [Focus] results to [Evade] results.
When defending, you may cancel [Critical Hit] results before [Hit] results.
When you perform the coordinate action, after you choose a friendly ship and before it performs a free action, you may receive 2 stress tokens to remove 1 stress token from it.
When placing a bomb token you dropped after revealing your manuever dial, you may place the bomb token anywhere on the play area touching your ship.
When attacking, if the defender is at range 1 of a bomb token, the defender rolls 1 fewer defense die (to a minimum of 0).
When attacking, if the attack is obstructed, the defender rolls 2 fewer defense dice (to a minimum of 0).
After you perform a boost or barrel roll action, you may flip your equipped "Servomotor S-foils" Upgrade card.
When attacking, if the defender does not have a focus or evade token, you may change 1 of your blank or [Focus] results to a [Hit] result.
When a friendly ship at Range 1-2 attacks, if it is stressed or has at least 1 Damage card, it may reroll 1 attack die.
After you perform a focus action, you may remove 1 of your focus tokens to assign it to a friendly ship at Range 1-2.
After you perform a boost action, you may receive 1 stress token to receive 1 evade token.
When defending, if the attacker is jammed, add 1 [Evade] result to your roll.
After a friendly ship executes a 1-speed maneuver, if it is at Range 1 and did not overlap a ship, you may assign 1 of your focus or evade tokens to it.
When you become the active ship during the Activation phase, if you have 1 or more focus tokens, you may perform a free action.
When another ship at Range 1-2 is defending, the attacker cannot reroll more than 1 attack die.

upgrades.name: Veteran Instincts
upgrades.rulesText: Increase your pilot skill value by 2.

upgrades.name: Push the Limit
upgrades.rulesText: Once per round, after you perform an action, you may perform 1 free action shown in your action bar. Then receive 1 stress token.

upgrades.name: Predator
upgrades.rulesText: When attacking, you may reroll 1 attack die. If the defender's pilot skill value is 2 or lower, you may instead reroll up to 2 attack dice.

upgrades.name: Crack Shot
upgrades.rulesText: When attacking a ship inside your firing arc, you may discard this card to cancel 1 of the defender's evade results.

upgrades.name: Marksmanship
upgrades.rulesText: Action: When attacking this round, you may change 1 of your focus results to a critical hit result and all of your other focus results to hit results.

upgrades.name: Lone Wolf
upgrades.rulesText: When attacking or defending, if there are no other friendly ships at Range 1-2, you may reroll 1 of your blank results.

upgrades.name: Expertise
upgrades.rulesText: When attacking, if you have no stress tokens, you may change all of your focus results to hit results.

upgrades.name: Swarm Tactics
upgrades.rulesText: At the start of the Combat phase, choose 1 friendly ship at Range 1. Until the end of this phase, treat that ship as if its pilot skill were equal to yours.

upgrades.name: R2-D2
upgrades.rulesText: After executing a green maneuver, you may recover 1 shield (up to your shield value).

upgrades.name: R2 Astromech
upgrades.rulesText: You may treat all 1- and 2-speed maneuvers as green maneuvers.

upgrades.name: R3-A2
upgrades.rulesText: When you declare the target of your attack, if the defender is inside your firing arc, you may receive 1 stress token to cause the defender to receive 1 stress token.

upgrades.name: R5-K6
upgrades.rulesText: After spending your target lock, roll 1 defense die. On an evade result, immediately acquire a target lock on that same ship. You cannot spend this target lock during this attack.

upgrades.name: R7-T1
upgrades.rulesText: Action: Choose an enemy ship at Range 1-2. If you are inside that ship's firing arc, you may acquire a target lock on that ship. Then, you may perform a free boost action.

upgrades.name: BB-8
upgrades.rulesText: When you reveal a green maneuver, you may perform a free barrel roll action.

upgrades.name: Proton Torpedoes
upgrades.rulesText: Attack (target lock): Spend your target lock and discard this card to perform this attack. You may change 1 of your focus results to a critical hit result.

upgrades.name: Advanced Proton Torpedoes
upgrades.rulesText: Attack (target lock, focus): Spend your target lock and discard this card to perform this attack. You may change 1 of your blank results to a focus result.

upgrades.name: Plasma Torpedoes
upgrades.rulesText: Attack (target lock): Spend your target lock and discard this card to perform this attack. If this attack hits, after dealing damage, remove 1 shield token from the defender.

upgrades.name: Ion Torpedoes
upgrades.rulesText: Attack (target lock): Spend your target lock and discard this card to perform this attack. If this attack hits, the defender suffers 1 damage and receives 1 ion token. Then cancel all dice results.

upgrades.name: Concussion Missiles
upgrades.rulesText: Attack (target lock): Spend your target lock and discard this card to perform this attack. You may change 1 of your blank results to a hit result.

upgrades.name: Homing Missiles
upgrades.rulesText: Attack (target lock, focus): Spend your target lock and discard this card to perform this attack. The defender cannot spend evade tokens during this attack.

upgrades.name: Cluster Missiles
upgrades.rulesText: Attack (target lock): Spend your target lock and discard this card to perform this attack twice.

upgrades.name: Assault Missiles
upgrades.rulesText: Attack (target lock): Spend your target lock and discard this card to perform this attack. If this attack hits, each other ship at Range 1 of the defender suffers 1 damage.

upgrades.name: Proton Rockets
upgrades.rulesText: Attack (focus): Discard this card to perform this attack. You may roll additional attack dice equal to your agility value, to a maximum of 3 additional dice.

upgrades.name: Ion Cannon
upgrades.rulesText: Attack: Attack 1 ship. If this attack hits, the defender suffers 1 damage and receives 1 ion token. Then cancel all dice results.

upgrades.name: Heavy Laser Cannon
upgrades.rulesText: Attack: Attack 1 ship. Immediately after rolling your attack dice, you must change all of your critical hit results to hit results.

upgrades.name: Autoblaster
upgrades.rulesText: Attack: Attack 1 ship. Your hit results cannot be canceled by defense dice. The defender may cancel critical hit results before hit results.

upgrades.name: Mangler Cannon
upgrades.rulesText: Attack: Attack 1 ship. When you attack with this weapon, you may change 1 of your hit results to a critical hit result.

upgrades.name: Twin Laser Turret
upgrades.rulesText: Attack: Attack 1 ship (even a ship outside your firing arc). Perform this attack twice. Each attack cannot be modified by more than 1 focus token or spend more than 1 focus token.

upgrades.name: Blaster Turret
upgrades.rulesText: Attack (focus): Attack 1 ship (even a ship outside your firing arc). You may change 1 of your focus results to a hit result.

upgrades.name: Ion Cannon Turret
upgrades.rulesText: Attack: Attack 1 ship (even a ship outside your firing arc). If this attack hits, the defender suffers 1 damage and receives 1 ion token. Then cancel all dice results.

upgrades.name: Autoblaster Turret
upgrades.rulesText: Attack: Attack 1 ship (even a ship outside your firing arc). Your hit results cannot be canceled by defense dice. The defender may cancel critical hit results before hit results.

upgrades.name: Dorsal Turret
upgrades.rulesText: Attack: Attack 1 ship (even a ship outside your firing arc). If the target of this attack is inside your firing arc, roll 1 additional attack die.

upgrades.name: Chewbacca
upgrades.rulesText: When you are dealt a faceup Damage card, immediately flip it facedown (without resolving its effect).

upgrades.name: Han Solo
upgrades.rulesText: When attacking, you may reroll all of your dice. If you do so, you cannot spend focus tokens during this attack.

upgrades.name: Luke Skywalker
upgrades.rulesText: After you perform an attack that does not hit, you may immediately perform a primary weapon attack. You may change 1 focus result to a hit result. You cannot perform another attack this round.

upgrades.name: Gunner
upgrades.rulesText: After you perform an attack that does not hit, you may immediately perform a primary weapon attack. You cannot perform another attack this round.

upgrades.name: Intelligence Agent
upgrades.rulesText: At the start of the Activation phase, choose 1 enemy ship at Range 1-2. You may look at that ship's chosen maneuver.

upgrades.name: Recon Specialist
upgrades.rulesText: When you perform a focus action, assign 1 additional focus token to your ship.

upgrades.name: Darth Vader
upgrades.rulesText: After you perform an attack against an enemy ship, you may suffer 2 damage to cause that ship to suffer 1 damage.

upgrades.name: Fleet Officer
upgrades.rulesText: Action: Choose up to 2 friendly ships at Range 1-2 and assign 1 focus token to each of those ships. Then receive 1 stress token.

upgrades.name: Proton Bombs
upgrades.rulesText: When you reveal your maneuver dial, you may discard this card to drop 1 proton bomb token. This token detonates at the end of the Activation phase.

upgrades.name: Seismic Charges
upgrades.rulesText: When you reveal your maneuver dial, you may discard this card to drop 1 seismic charge token. This token detonates at the end of the Activation phase.

upgrades.name: Proximity Mines
upgrades.rulesText: Action: Discard this card to drop 1 proximity mine token. When a ship's base or maneuver template overlaps this token, this token detonates.

upgrades.name: Cluster Mines
upgrades.rulesText: Action: Discard this card to drop 1 cluster mine token set. When a ship overlaps one of these tokens, that token detonates.

upgrades.name: Ion Bombs
upgrades.rulesText: When you reveal your maneuver dial, you may discard this card to drop 1 ion bomb token. This token detonates at the end of the Activation phase.

upgrades.name: Hull Upgrade
upgrades.rulesText: Increase your hull value by 1.

upgrades.name: Shield Upgrade
upgrades.rulesText: Increase your shield value by 1.

upgrades.name: Engine Upgrade
upgrades.rulesText: Your action bar gains the boost action icon.

upgrades.name: Stealth Device
upgrades.rulesText: Increase your agility value by 1. If you are hit by an attack, discard this card.

upgrades.name: Autothrusters
upgrades.rulesText: When defending, if you are beyond Range 2 or outside the attacker's firing arc, you may change 1 of your blank results to an evade result. You can equip this card only if you have the boost action icon.

upgrades.name: Targeting Computer
upgrades.rulesText: Your action bar gains the target lock action icon.

upgrades.name: Advanced Sensors
upgrades.rulesText: Immediately before you reveal your maneuver, you may perform 1 free action. If you use this ability, you must skip your Perform Action step during this round.

upgrades.name: Fire-Control System
upgrades.rulesText: After you perform an attack, you may acquire a target lock on the defender.

upgrades.name: Sensor Jammer
upgrades.rulesText: When defending, you may change 1 of the attacker's hit results to a focus result. The attacker cannot reroll the die with the changed result.

upgrades.name: Accuracy Corrector
upgrades.rulesText: When attacking, during the Modify Attack Dice step, you may cancel all of your dice results. Then, you may add 2 hit results. Your dice cannot be modified again during this attack.

upgrades.name: Collision Detector
upgrades.rulesText: When you reveal a maneuver, you may rotate your dial to another maneuver with the same bearing. You cannot rotate to a red maneuver if you have any stress tokens. You can only equip this upgrade if you have the system upgrade icon.

upgrades.name: Glitterstim
upgrades.rulesText: At the start of the Combat phase, you may discard this card and receive 1 stress token. If you do, until the end of the round, when attacking or defending, you may convert all of your focus results to hit or evade results.

upgrades.name: Inertial Dampeners
upgrades.rulesText: When you reveal your maneuver, you may discard this card to instead perform a white [0 stop] maneuver. Then receive 1 stress token.

upgrades.name: Hot Shot Blaster
upgrades.rulesText: Attack (energy): Attack 1 ship. You may receive 1 ion token to roll 1 additional attack die. If you do not have an energy token, you cannot perform this attack.

upgrades.name: Dead Man's Switch
upgrades.rulesText: When you are destroyed, each other ship at Range 1 suffers 1 damage.

upgrades.name: Feedback Array
upgrades.rulesText: During the Combat phase, instead of performing an attack, you may receive 1 ion token and suffer 1 damage to cause each ship at Range 1 to suffer 1 damage.

upgrades.name: Millennium Falcon
upgrades.rulesText: Your action bar gains the evade action icon.

upgrades.name: Slave I
upgrades.rulesText: After you execute a 3-speed bank maneuver or a 3-speed turn maneuver, you may perform a free boost action.

upgrades.name: Royal Guard TIE
upgrades.rulesText: You may equip up to 2 Modification upgrades (instead of 1). You cannot equip this upgrade if your pilot skill value is 4 or lower.

upgrades.name: TIE/x1
upgrades.rulesText: After you perform a boost or barrel roll action, you may perform a free evade action.

upgrades.name: Outrider
upgrades.rulesText: While you have a cannon upgrade card equipped, you cannot perform primary weapon attacks and you may perform cannon secondary weapon attacks against ships outside your firing arc.

upgrades.name: Comm Relay
upgrades.rulesText: During the End phase, you may receive 1 evade or focus token. If you do not have any focus or evade tokens at the end of the Combat phase, you may not use this ability until the end of the next round.

upgrades.name: Pattern Analyzer
upgrades.rulesText: When you fully execute a maneuver, you may postpone triggering any abilities that occur after executing that maneuver until after you perform an action.

upgrades.name: Primed Thrusters
upgrades.rulesText: When you reveal a [3 straight] maneuver, you may treat it as a green maneuver.

upgrades.name: Targeting Synchronizer
upgrades.rulesText: When a friendly ship at Range 1-2 is attacking a ship you have locked, it may treat that ship as being locked as well.

upgrades.name: Sensor Cluster
upgrades.rulesText: When defending, you may spend a focus token to change 1 of your blank results to an evade result.

upgrades.name: Salvaged Astromech
upgrades.rulesText: When you are dealt a faceup Damage card with the Ship trait, you may immediately discard that card (before resolving its effect). Then, discard this Upgrade card.

upgrades.name: R4 Agromech
upgrades.rulesText: When attacking, after you spend a focus token, you may receive 1 stress token to receive 1 focus token.

upgrades.name: Unhinged Astromech
upgrades.rulesText: You may treat all 3-speed maneuvers as green maneuvers.

upgrades.name: R2-F2
upgrades.rulesText: Action: Increase your agility value by 1 until the end of this game round.

upgrades.name: R5-D8
upgrades.rulesText:
Action: Roll 1 defense die.

On a [Evade] or [Focus] result, discard 1 of your facedown Damage cards.

upgrades.name: R5 Astromech
upgrades.rulesText: During the End phase, you may choose 1 of your faceup Damage cards with the Ship trait and flip it facedown.

upgrades.name: Determination
upgrades.rulesText: When you are dealt a faceup Damage card with the Pilot trait, discard it immediately without resolving its effect.

upgrades.name: Squad Leader
upgrades.rulesText:
Action: Choose 1 ship at Range 1-2 that has a lower pilot skill than you.

The chosen ship may immediately perform 1 free action.

upgrades.name: Expert Handling
upgrades.rulesText: Action: Perform a free barrel roll action. If you do not have the [Barrel Roll] action icon, receive 1 stress token. You may then remove 1 enemy target lock from your ship

upgrades.name: Daredevil
upgrades.rulesText: Action: Execute a white ([Turn Left] 1) or ([Turn Right] 1) maneuver. Then, receive 1 stress token. Then, if you do not have the [Boost] action icon, roll 2 attack dice. Suffer any damage ([Hit]) and any critical damage ([Critical Hit]) rolled.

upgrades.name: Elusiveness
upgrades.rulesText:
When defending, you may receive 1 stress token to choose 1 attack die. The attacker must reroll that die.

If you have at least 1 stress token, you cannot use this ability.

upgrades.name: Deadeye
upgrades.rulesText:
You may treat the Attack (target lock): header as Attack (focus):.

When an attack instructs you to spend a target lock, you may spend a focus token instead.

upgrades.name: Expose
upgrades.rulesText: Action: Until the end of the round, increase your primary weapon value by 1 and decrease your agility value by 1.

upgrades.name: Mercenary Copilot
upgrades.rulesText: When attacking at Range 3, you may change 1 of your [Hit] results to a [Critical Hit] result.

upgrades.name: Weapons Engineer
upgrades.rulesText:
You may maintain 2 target locks (only 1 per enemy ship).

When you acquire a target lock, you may lock onto 2 different ships.

upgrades.name: Draw Their Fire
upgrades.rulesText: When a friendly ship at Range 1 is hit by an attack, you may suffer 1 of the uncanceled [Critical Hit] results instead of the target ship.

upgrades.name: Nien Nunb
upgrades.rulesText: You may treat all [Straight] maneuvers as green maneuvers.

upgrades.name: Saboteur
upgrades.rulesText: Action: Choose 1 enemy ship at Range 1 and roll 1 attack die. On a [Hit] or [Critical Hit] result, choose 1 random facedown Damage card assigned to that ship, flip it faceup, and resolve it.

upgrades.name: Adrenaline Rush
upgrades.rulesText: When you reveal a red maneuver, you may discard this card to treat that maneuver as a white maneuver until the end of the Activation phase.

upgrades.name: Rebel Captive
upgrades.rulesText: Once per round, the first ship that declares you as the target of an attack immediately receives 1 stress token.

upgrades.name: Flight Instructor
upgrades.rulesText: When defending, you may reroll 1 of your [Focus] results.  If the attacker's pilot skill value is "2" or lower, you may reroll 1 of your blank results instead.

upgrades.name: Navigator
upgrades.rulesText:
When you reveal a maneuver, you may rotate your dial to another maneuver with the same bearing.

You cannot rotate to a red maneuver if you have any stress tokens.

upgrades.name: Opportunist
upgrades.rulesText:
When attacking, if the defender does not have any focus or evade tokens, you may receive 1 stress token to roll 1 additional attack die.

You cannot use this ability if you have any stress tokens.

upgrades.name: Comms Booster
upgrades.rulesText: Energy: Spend 1 energy to remove all stress tokens from a friendly ship at Range 1-3. Then assign 1 focus token to that ship.

upgrades.name: Slicer Tools
upgrades.rulesText: Action: Choose 1 or more ships at Range 1-3 that have a stress token. For each ship chosen, you may spend 1 energy to cause that ship to suffer 1 damage.

upgrades.name: Shield Projector
upgrades.rulesText: When an enemy ship is declaring either a small or large ship as the target of its attack, you may spend 3 energy to force that ship to target you if possible.

upgrades.name: Ion Pulse Missiles
upgrades.rulesText:
Attack (target lock): Discard this card to perform this attack.

If this attack hits, the defender suffers 1 damage and receives 2 ion tokens. Then cancel all dice results.

upgrades.name: Wingman
upgrades.rulesText: At the start of the Combat phase, remove 1 stress token from another friendly ship at Range 1.

upgrades.name: Decoy
upgrades.rulesText: At the start of the Combat phase, you may choose 1 friendly ship at Range 1-2. Exchange your pilot skill with that ship's pilot skill until the end of the phase.

upgrades.name: Outmaneuver
upgrades.rulesText: When attacking a ship inside your firing arc, if you are not inside that ship's firing arc, reduce its agility value by 1 (to a minimum of 0).

upgrades.name: Flechette Torpedoes
upgrades.rulesText:
Attack (target lock): Discard this card and spend your target lock to perform this attack.

After you perform this attack, the defender receives 1 stress token if its hull value is "4" or lower.

upgrades.name: R7 Astromech
upgrades.rulesText: Once per round when defending, if you have a target lock on the attacker, you may spend the target lock to choose any or all attack dice. The attacker must reroll the chosen dice.

upgrades.name: Tactician
upgrades.rulesText: After you perform an attack against a ship inside your firing arc at Range 2, that ship receives 1 stress token.

upgrades.name: R2-D2
upgrades.rulesText: At the end of the End phase, if you have no shields, you may recover 1 shield and roll 1 attack die.  On a [Hit] result, randomly flip 1 of your facedown Damage cards faceup and resolve it.

upgrades.name: C-3PO
upgrades.rulesText: Once per round, before you roll 1 or more defense dice, you may guess aloud a number of [Evade] results.  If you roll that many [Evade] results (before modifying dice), add 1 [Evade] result.

upgrades.name: Single Turbolasers
upgrades.rulesText: Attack (Energy): Spend 2 energy from this card to perform this attack. The defender doubles his agility value against this attack. You may change 1 of your [Focus] results to a [Hit] result.

upgrades.name: Quad Laser Cannons
upgrades.rulesText: Attack (Energy): Spend 1 energy from this card to perform this attack. If this attack does not hit, you may immediately spend 1 energy from this card to perform this attack again.

upgrades.name: Tibanna Gas Supplies
upgrades.rulesText: Energy: You may discard this card to gain 3 energy.

upgrades.name: Ionization Reactor
upgrades.rulesText: Energy: Spend 5 energy from this card and discard this card to cause each other ship at Range 1 to suffer 1 damage and receive 1 ion token.

upgrades.name: Engine Booster
upgrades.rulesText: Immediately before you reveal your maneuver dial, you may spend 1 energy to execute a white ([Straight] 1) maneuver.  You cannot use this ability if you would overlap another ship.

upgrades.name: R2-D6
upgrades.rulesText:
Your upgrade bar gains the [Elite] upgrade icon.

You cannot equip this upgrade if you already have a [Elite] upgrade icon or if your pilot skill value is "2" or lower.

upgrades.name: Enhanced Scopes
upgrades.rulesText: During the Activation phase, treat your pilot skill value as "0".

upgrades.name: Chardaan Refit
upgrades.rulesText: This card has a negative squad point cost.

upgrades.name: Kyle Katarn
upgrades.rulesText: After you remove a stress token from your ship, you may assign a focus token to your ship.

upgrades.name: Jan Ors
upgrades.rulesText: Once per round, when a friendly ship at Range 1-3 performs a focus action or would be assigned a focus token, you may assign that ship an evade token instead.

upgrades.name: Toryn Farr
upgrades.rulesText: Action: Spend any amount of energy to choose that many enemy ships at Range 1-2. Remove all focus, evade, and blue target lock tokens from those ships.

upgrades.name: R4-D6
upgrades.rulesText: When you are hit by an attack and there are at least 3 uncanceled [Hit] results, you may choose to cancel those results until there are 2 remaining. For each result canceled this way, receive 1 stress token.

upgrades.name: R5-P9
upgrades.rulesText: At the end of the Combat phase, you may spend 1 of your focus tokens to recover 1 shield (up to your shield value).

upgrades.name: WED-15 Repair Droid
upgrades.rulesText: Action: Spend 1 energy to discard 1 of your facedown Damage cards, or spend 3 energy to discard 1 of your faceup Damage cards.

upgrades.name: Carlist Rieekan
upgrades.rulesText: At the start of the Activation phase, you may discard this card to treat each friendly ship's pilot skill value as "12" until the end of the phase.

upgrades.name: Jan Dodonna
upgrades.rulesText: When another friendly ship at Range 1 is attacking, it may change 1 of its [Hit] results to a [Critical Hit].

upgrades.name: Expanded Cargo Hold
upgrades.rulesText: Once per round, when you would be dealt a faceup Damage card, you may draw that card from either the fore or aft Damage deck.

upgrades.name: Backup Shield Generator
upgrades.rulesText: At the end of each round, you may spend 1 energy to recover 1 shield (up to your shield value).

upgrades.name: EM Emitter
upgrades.rulesText: When you obstruct an attack, the defender rolls 3 additional defense dice (instead of 1).

upgrades.name: Frequency Jammer
upgrades.rulesText: When you perform a jam action, choose 1 enemy ship that does not have a stress token and is at Range 1 of the jammed ship. The chosen ship receives 1 stress token.

upgrades.name: Leia Organa
upgrades.rulesText: At the start of the Activation phase, you may discard this card to allow all friendly ships that reveal a red maneuver to treat that maneuver as a white maneuver until the end of the phase.

upgrades.name: Targeting Coordinator
upgrades.rulesText: Energy: You may spend 1 energy to choose 1 friendly ship at Range 1-2. Acquire a target lock, then assign the blue target lock token to the chosen ship.

upgrades.name: Raymus Antilles
upgrades.rulesText: At the start of the Activation phase, choose 1 enemy ship at Range 1-3. You may look at that ship's chosen maneuver. If the maneuver is white, assign that ship 1 stress token.

upgrades.name: Gunnery Team
upgrades.rulesText: Once per round, when attacking with a secondary weapon, you may spend 1 energy to change 1 of your blank results to a [Hit] result.

upgrades.name: Sensor Team
upgrades.rulesText: When acquiring a target lock, you may lock onto an enemy ship at Range 1-5 (instead of Range 1-3).

upgrades.name: Engineering Team
upgrades.rulesText: During the Activation phase, when you reveal a [Straight] maneuver, gain 1 additional energy during the "Gain Energy" step.

upgrades.name: Lando Calrissian
upgrades.rulesText: Action: Roll 2 defense dice. For each [Focus] result, assign 1 focus token to your ship. For each [Evade] result, assign 1 evade token to your ship.

upgrades.name: Mara Jade
upgrades.rulesText: At the end of the Combat phase, each enemy ship at Range 1 that does not have a stress token receives 1 stress token.

upgrades.name: Stay on Target
upgrades.rulesText: When you reveal a maneuver, you may rotate your dial to another maneuver with the same speed. Treat your maneuver as a red maneuver.

upgrades.name: Dash Rendar
upgrades.rulesText:
You may perform attacks while overlapping an obstacle.

Your attacks cannot be obstructed.

upgrades.name: "Leebo"
upgrades.rulesText: Action: Perform a free boost action. Then receive 1 ion token.

upgrades.name: Ysanne Isard
upgrades.rulesText: At the start of the Combat phase, if you have no shields and at least 1 Damage card assigned to your ship, you may perform a free evade action.

upgrades.name: Moff Jerjerrod
upgrades.rulesText: When you are dealt a faceup Damage card, you may discard this Upgrade card or another [Crew] Upgrade card to flip that Damage card facedown (without resolving its effect.)

upgrades.name: Ruthlessness
upgrades.rulesText: After you perform an attack that hits, you must choose 1 other ship at Range 1 of the defender (other than yourself). That ship suffers 1 damage.

upgrades.name: Intimidation
upgrades.rulesText: While you are touching an enemy ship, reduce that ship's agility value by 1.

upgrades.name: Greedo
upgrades.rulesText: The first time you attack each round and the first time you defend each round, the first Damage card dealt is dealt faceup.

upgrades.name: Bodyguard
upgrades.rulesText: At the start of the Combat phase, you may spend a focus token to choose a friendly ship at Range 1 with higher pilot skill than you. Increase its agility value by 1 until the end of the round.

upgrades.name: "Genius"
upgrades.rulesText: After you reveal and execute a maneuver, if you did not overlap a ship, you may discard 1 of your equipped [Bomb] Upgrade cards without the "Action:" header to drop the corresponding bomb token.

upgrades.name: Bomb Loadout
upgrades.rulesText: Your upgrade bar gains the [Bomb] icon.

upgrades.name: R4-B11
upgrades.rulesText: When attacking, if you have a target lock on the defender, you may spend the target lock to choose any or all defense dice. The defender must reroll the chosen dice.

upgrades.name: Outlaw Tech
upgrades.rulesText: After you execute a red maneuver, you may assign 1 focus token to your ship.

upgrades.name: K4 Security Droid
upgrades.rulesText: After executing a green maneuver, you may acquire a target lock.

upgrades.name: Advanced Targeting Computer
upgrades.rulesText: When attacking with your primary weapon, if you have a target lock on the defender, you may add 1 [Critical Hit] result to your roll. If you do, you cannot spend target locks during this attack.

upgrades.name: Ion Cannon Battery
upgrades.rulesText: Attack (Energy): Spend 2 energy from this card to perform this attack. If this attack hits, the defender suffers 1 critical damage and receives 1 ion token. Then cancel all dice results.

upgrades.name: Flechette Cannon
upgrades.rulesText:
Attack: Attack 1 ship.

If this attack hits, the defender suffers 1 damage and, if the defender is not stressed, it also receives 1 stress token. Then cancel all dice results.

upgrades.name: Calculation
upgrades.rulesText: When attacking, you may spend a focus token to change 1 of your [Focus] results to a [Critical Hit] result.

upgrades.name: Grand Moff Tarkin
upgrades.rulesText: At the start of the Combat phase, you may choose another ship at Range 1-4. Either remove 1 focus token from the chosen ship or assign 1 focus token to that ship.

upgrades.name: Captain Needa
upgrades.rulesText: If you overlap an obstacle during the Activation phase, do not suffer 1 faceup damage card. Instead, roll 1 attack die. On a [Hit] or [Critical Hit] result, suffer 1 damage.

upgrades.name: Admiral Ozzel
upgrades.rulesText: Energy: You may remove up to 3 shields from your ship. For each shield removed, gain 1 energy.

upgrades.name: Emperor Palpatine
upgrades.rulesText: Once per round, before a friendly ship rolls dice, you may name a die result. After rolling, you must change 1 of your dice results to the named result. That die result cannot be modified again.

upgrades.name: Bossk
upgrades.rulesText: After you perform an attack that does not hit, if you are not stressed, you must receive 1 stress token. Then assign 1 focus token to your ship and acquire a target lock on the defender.

upgrades.name: Hound's Tooth
upgrades.rulesText:
After you are destroyed, before you are removed from the play area, you may deploy the Nastah Pup Pilot.

It cannot attack this round.

upgrades.name: Lightning Reflexes
upgrades.rulesText: After you execute a white or green maneuver on your dial, you may discard this card to rotate your ship 180°. Then receive 1 stress token after the "Check Pilot Stress" step.

upgrades.name: Conner Net
upgrades.rulesText:
Action: Discard this card to drop 1 Conner net token.

When a ship's base or maneuver template overlaps this token, this token detonates.

upgrades.name: Extra Munitions
upgrades.rulesText: When you equip this card, place 1 ordnance token on each equipped [Torpedo], [Missile], and [Bomb] Upgrade card. When you are instructed to discard an Upgrade card, you may discard 1 ordnance token on that card instead.

upgrades.name: Bombardier
upgrades.rulesText: When dropping a bomb, you may use the ([Straight] 2) template instead of the ([Straight] 1) template.

upgrades.name: Advanced Homing Missiles
upgrades.rulesText:
Attack (target lock): Discard this card to perform this attack.

If this attack hits, deal 1 faceup Damage card to the defender. Then cancel all dice results.

upgrades.name: Shield Technician
upgrades.rulesText: When you perform a recover action, instead of spending all of your energy, you can choose any amount of energy to spend.

upgrades.name: R5-X3
upgrades.rulesText: Before you reveal your maneuver, you may discard this card to ignore obstacles until the end of the round.

upgrades.name: Cool Hand
upgrades.rulesText: When you receive a stress token, you may discard this card to assign 1 focus or evade token to your ship.

upgrades.name: Juke
upgrades.rulesText: When attacking, if you have an evade token, you may change 1 of the defender's [Evade] results to a [Focus] result.

upgrades.name: Wired
upgrades.rulesText: When attacking or defending, if you are stressed, you may reroll 1 or more of your [Focus] results.

upgrades.name: Weapons Guidance
upgrades.rulesText: When attacking, you may spend a focus token to change 1 of your blank results to a [Hit] result.

upgrades.name: Moldy Crow
upgrades.rulesText: During the End phase, do not remove unused focus tokens from your ship.

upgrades.name: ST-321
upgrades.rulesText: When acquiring a target lock, you may lock onto any enemy ship in the play area.

upgrades.name: Dodonna's Pride
upgrades.rulesText: When you perform a coordinate action, you may choose 2 friendly ships (instead of 1).  Those ships may each perform 1 free action.

upgrades.name: A-wing Test Pilot
upgrades.rulesText:
Your upgrade bar gains 1 [Elite] upgrade icon.

You cannot equip 2 of the same [Elite] Upgrade cards. You cannot equip this if your pilot skill value is "1" or lower.

upgrades.name: Tantive IV
upgrades.rulesText: Your fore section upgrade bar gains 1 additional [Crew] and 1 additional [Team] upgrade icon.

upgrades.name: Bright Hope
upgrades.rulesText: A reinforce token assigned to your fore section acts as 2 [Evade] results (instead of one).

upgrades.name: Quantum Storm
upgrades.rulesText: At the start of the End phase, if you have 1 or fewer energy tokens, gain 1 energy token.

upgrades.name: Dutyfree
upgrades.rulesText: When performing a jam action, you may choose an enemy ship at Range 1-3 (instead of at Range 1-2).

upgrades.name: Jaina's Light
upgrades.rulesText: When defending, once per attack, if you are dealt a faceup Damage card, you may discard it and draw another faceup Damage card.

upgrades.name: Dauntless
upgrades.rulesText: After you execute a maneuver that causes you to overlap another ship, you may perform 1 free action. Then receive 1 stress token.

upgrades.name: "Heavy Scyk" Interceptor
upgrades.rulesText:
Your upgrade bar gains the [Cannon], [Torpedo] or [Missile] upgrade icon.

Increase your hull value by 1.

upgrades.name: IG-2000
upgrades.rulesText: You have the pilot ability of each other friendly ship with the IG-2000 Upgrade card (in addition to your own pilot ability).

upgrades.name: Virago
upgrades.rulesText:
Your upgrade bar gains the [System] and [Illicit] upgrade icons.

You cannot equip this card if your pilot skill value is "3" or lower.

upgrades.name: Andrasta
upgrades.rulesText: Your upgrade bar gains two additional [Bomb] upgrade icons.

upgrades.name: BTL-A4 Y-wing
upgrades.rulesText: You cannot attack ships outside your firing arc. After you perform a primary weapon attack, you may immediately perform an attack with a [Turret] secondary weapon.

upgrades.name: Assailer
upgrades.rulesText: When defending, if the targeted section has a reinforce token, you may change 1 [Focus] result to a [Evade] result.

upgrades.name: Instigator
upgrades.rulesText: After you perform a recover action, recover 1 additional shield.

upgrades.name: Impetuous
upgrades.rulesText: After you perform an attack that destroys an enemy ship, you may acquire a target lock.

upgrades.name: Anti-Pursuit Lasers
upgrades.rulesText: After an enemy ship executes a maneuver that causes it to overlap your ship, roll 1 attack die.  On a [Hit] or [Critical Hit] result, the enemy ship suffers 1 damage.

upgrades.name: Munitions Failsafe
upgrades.rulesText: When attacking with a secondary weapon that instructs you to discard it to perform the attack, do not discard it unless the attack hits.

upgrades.name: Stygium Particle Accelerator
upgrades.rulesText: When you either decloak or perform a cloak action, you may perform a free evade action.

upgrades.name: Advanced Cloaking Device
upgrades.rulesText: After you perform an attack, you may perform a free cloak action.

upgrades.name: Combat Retrofit
upgrades.rulesText: Increase your hull value by 2 and your shield value by 1.

upgrades.name: B-wing/E2
upgrades.rulesText: Your upgrade bar gains the [Crew] upgrade icon.

upgrades.name: Experimental Interface
upgrades.rulesText: Once per round, after you perform an action, you may perform 1 free action from an equipped Upgrade card with the "Action:" header. Then receive 1 stress token.

upgrades.name: Countermeasures
upgrades.rulesText: At the start of the Combat phase, you may discard this card to increase your agility value by 1 until the end of the round. Then you may remove 1 enemy target lock from your ship.

upgrades.name: Tactical Jammer
upgrades.rulesText: Your ship can obstruct enemy attacks.

upgrades.name: Advanced SLAM
upgrades.rulesText: After performing a SLAM action, if you did not overlap an obstacle or another ship, you may perform a free action on your action bar.

upgrades.name: Twin Ion Engine Mk. II
upgrades.rulesText: You may treat all bank maneuvers ([Bank Left] or [Bank Right]) as green maneuvers.

upgrades.name: Maneuvering Fins
upgrades.rulesText: When you reveal a turn maneuver ([Turn Left] or [Turn Right]), you may rotate your dial to the corresponding bank maneuver ([Bank Left] or [Bank Right]) of the same speed.

upgrades.name: Ion Projector
upgrades.rulesText: After an enemy ship executes a maneuver that causes it to overlap your ship, roll 1 attack die. On a [Hit] or [Critical Hit] result, the enemy ship receives 1 ion token.

upgrades.name: Integrated Astromech
upgrades.rulesText: When you are dealt a Damage card, you may discard 1 of your [Astromech] Upgrade cards to discard that Damage card (without resolving its effect).

upgrades.name: Punishing One
upgrades.rulesText: Increase your primary weapon value by 1.

upgrades.name: Tractor Beam
upgrades.rulesText:
Attack: Attack 1 ship.

If this attack hits, the defender receives 1 tractor beam token. Then cancel all dice results.

upgrades.name: Cloaking Device
upgrades.rulesText:
Action: Perform a free cloak action.

At the end of each round, roll 1 attack die. On a [Focus] result, discard this card, then decloak or discard your cloak token.

upgrades.name: Phantom
upgrades.rulesText: While you are docked, the Ghost can perform primary weapon attacks from its special firing arc and, at the end of the Combat phase, it may perform an additional attack with an equipped [Turret]. If it performs this attack, it cannot attack again this round.

upgrades.name: Ghost
upgrades.rulesText:
Equip the Phantom title card to a friendly Attack Shuttle and dock it to this ship.

After you execute a maneuver, you may deploy it from your rear guides.

upgrades.name: XX-23 S-Thread Tracers
upgrades.rulesText: Attack (Focus): Discard this card to perform this attack. If this attack hits, each friendly ship at Range 1-2 of you may acquire a target lock on the defender. Then cancel all dice results.

upgrades.name: Agent Kallus
upgrades.rulesText: At the start of the first round, choose 1 enemy small or large ship. When attacking or defending against that ship, you may change 1 of your [Focus] results to a [Hit] or [Evade] result.

upgrades.name: Ordnance Experts
upgrades.rulesText: Once per round, when a friendly ship at Range 1-3 performs an attack with a [Torpedo] or [Missile] secondary weapon, it may change 1 of its blank results to a [Hit] result.

upgrades.name: Automated Protocols
upgrades.rulesText: Once per round, after you perform an action that is not a recover or reinforce action, you may spend 1 energy to perform a free recover or reinforce action.

upgrades.name: Optimized Generators
upgrades.rulesText: Once per round, when you assign energy to an equipped Upgrade card, gain 2 energy.

upgrades.name: Ordnance Tubes
upgrades.rulesText:
You may treat each of your [Hardpoint] upgrade icons as a [Torpedo] or [Missile] upgrade icon.

When you are instructed to discard a [Torpedo] or [Missile] Upgrade card, do not discard it.

upgrades.name: Broadcast Array
upgrades.rulesText: Your action bar gains the [Jam] action icon.

upgrades.name: Docking Clamps
upgrades.rulesText: You may dock up to 4 TIE fighters, TIE Interceptors, TIE bombers, or TIE Advanced to this ship. All of these ships must have the same ship type.

upgrades.name: Dual Laser Turret
upgrades.rulesText: Attack (Energy): Spend 1 energy from this card to perform this attack against 1 ship (even a ship outside of your firing arc).

upgrades.name: TIE/v1
upgrades.rulesText: After you acquire a target lock, you may perform a free evade action.

upgrades.name: Mist Hunter
upgrades.rulesText:
Your action bar gains the [Barrel Roll] action icon.

You must equip 1 "Tractor Beam" Upgrade card (paying its squad point cost as normal).

upgrades.name: Kanan Jarrus
upgrades.rulesText: Once per round, after a friendly ship at Range 1-2 executes a white maneuver, you may remove 1 stress token from that ship.

upgrades.name: "Zeb" Orrelios
upgrades.rulesText: Enemy ships inside your firing arc that you are touching are not considered to be touching you when either you or they activate during the Combat phase.

upgrades.name: Reinforced Deflectors
upgrades.rulesText: After defending, if you suffered a combination of 3 or more damage and critical damage during the attack, recover 1 shield (up to your shield value).

upgrades.name: Targeting Astromech
upgrades.rulesText: After you execute a red maneuver, you may acquire a target lock.

upgrades.name: Ezra Bridger
upgrades.rulesText: When attacking, if you are stressed, you may change 1 of your [Focus] results to a [Critical Hit] result.

upgrades.name: "Chopper"
upgrades.rulesText:
You may perform actions even while you are stressed.

After you perform an action while you are stressed, suffer 1 damage.

upgrades.name: Hera Syndulla
upgrades.rulesText: You can reveal and execute red maneuvers even while you are stressed.

upgrades.name: Sabine Wren
upgrades.rulesText: Your upgrade bar gains the [Bomb] upgrade icon. Once per round, before a friendly bomb token is removed, choose 1 enemy ship at Range 1 of that token. That ship suffers 1 damage.

upgrades.name: TIE/x7
upgrades.rulesText:
Your upgrade bar loses the [Cannon] and [Missile] upgrade icons.

After executing a 3-, 4-, or 5-speed maneuver, if you did not overlap an obstacle or ship, you may perform a free evade action.

upgrades.name: TIE/D
upgrades.rulesText: Once per round, after you perform an attack with a [Cannon] secondary weapon that costs 3 or fewer squad points, you may perform a primary weapon attack.

upgrades.name: TIE Shuttle
upgrades.rulesText: Your upgrade bar loses all [Torpedo], [Missile] and [Bomb] upgrade icons and gains 2 [Crew] upgrade icons. You cannot equip a [Crew] Upgrade card that costs more than 4 squad points.

upgrades.name: Long-Range Scanners
upgrades.rulesText: You may acquire target locks on ships at Range 3 and beyond. You cannot acquire target locks on ships at Range 1-2. You can equip this card only if you have [Torpedo] and [Missile] in your upgrade bar.

upgrades.name: Construction Droid
upgrades.rulesText: When you perform a recover action, you may spend 1 energy to discard 1 facedown Damage card.

upgrades.name: Rear Admiral Chiraneau
upgrades.rulesText: Action: Execute a white ([Straight] 1) maneuver.

upgrades.name: Cluster Bombs
upgrades.rulesText: After defending, you may discard this card. If you do, each other ship at Range 1 of the defending section rolls 2 attack dice, suffering all damage ([Hit]) and critical damage ([Critical Hit]) rolled.

upgrades.name: Requiem
upgrades.rulesText: When you deploy a ship, treat its pilot skill value as "8" until the end of the round.

upgrades.name: Vector
upgrades.rulesText: After you execute a maneuver, you may deploy up to 4 docked ships (instead of 2).

upgrades.name: Suppressor
upgrades.rulesText: Once per round, after you acquire a target lock on an enemy ship, you may remove 1 focus, evade, or blue target lock token from that ship.

upgrades.name: Guidance Chips
upgrades.rulesText: Once per round, when attacking with a [Torpedo] or [Missile] secondary weapon, you may change 1 die result to a [Hit] result (or a [Critical Hit] result if your primary weapon value is "3" or higher).

upgrades.name: Zuckuss
upgrades.rulesText: When attacking, if you are not stressed, you may receive any number of stress tokens to choose an equal number of defense dice. The defender must reroll those dice.

upgrades.name: 4-LOM
upgrades.rulesText: When attacking, during the "Modify Attack Dice" step, you may receive 1 ion token to choose 1 of the defender's focus or evade tokens. That token cannot be spent during this attack.

upgrades.name: Adaptability (-1)
upgrades.rulesText: Decrease your pilot skill value by 1.

upgrades.name: Adaptability (+1)
upgrades.rulesText: Increase your pilot skill value by 1.

upgrades.name: Electronic Baffle
upgrades.rulesText: When you receive a stress token or an ion token, you may suffer 1 damage to discard that token.

upgrades.name: Rage
upgrades.rulesText: Action: Assign 1 focus token to your ship and receive 2 stress tokens. Until the end of the round, when attacking, you may reroll up to 3 attack dice.

upgrades.name: Attanni Mindlink
upgrades.rulesText: Each time you are assigned a focus or stress token, each other friendly ship with Attanni Mindlink must also be assigned the same type of token if it does not already have one.

upgrades.name: R5-P8
upgrades.rulesText: Once per round, after defending, you may roll 1 attack die. On a [Hit] result, the attacker suffers 1 damage. On a [Critical Hit] result, you and the attacker each suffer 1 damage.

upgrades.name: Boba Fett
upgrades.rulesText: After performing an attack, if the defender was dealt a faceup Damage card, you may discard this card to choose and discard 1 of the defender's Upgrade cards.

upgrades.name: "Gonk"
upgrades.rulesText:
Action: Place 1 shield token on this card.

Action: Remove 1 shield token from this card to recover 1 shield (up to your shield value).

upgrades.name: Dengar
upgrades.rulesText: When attacking, you may reroll 1 attack die. If the defender is a unique pilot, you may instead reroll up to 2 attack dice.

upgrades.name: Overclocked R4
upgrades.rulesText: During the Combat phase, when you spend a focus token, you may receive 1 stress token to assign 1 focus token to your ship.

upgrades.name: Thermal Detonators
upgrades.rulesText:
When you reveal your maneuver dial, you may discard this card to drop 1 thermal detonator token.

This token detonates at the end of the Activation phase.

upgrades.name: Millennium Falcon
upgrades.rulesText: After you execute a 3-speed bank maneuver ([Bank Left] or [Bank Right]), if you are not touching another ship and you are not stressed, you may receive 1 stress token to rotate your ship 180°.

upgrades.name: Black One
upgrades.rulesText: After you perform a boost or barrel roll action, you may remove 1 enemy target lock from a friendly ship at Range 1. You cannot equip this card if your pilot skill is "6" or lower.

upgrades.name: Systems Officer
upgrades.rulesText: After you execute a green maneuver, choose another friendly ship at Range 1. That ship may acquire a target lock.

upgrades.name: Alliance Overhaul
upgrades.rulesText: When attacking with a primary weapon from your primary firing arc, you may roll 1 additional attack die. When attacking from your auxiliary firing arc, you may change 1 of your [Focus] results to a [Critical Hit] result.

upgrades.name: Special Ops Training
upgrades.rulesText: When attacking with a primary weapon from your primary firing arc, you may roll 1 additional attack die. If you do not, you may perform an additional attack from your auxiliary firing arc.

upgrades.name: Concord Dawn Protector
upgrades.rulesText: When defending, if you are inside the attacker's firing arc and at Range 1 and the attacker is inside your firing arc, add 1 [Evade] result.

upgrades.name: Shadow Caster
upgrades.rulesText: After you perform an attack that hits, if the defender is inside your mobile firing arc and at Range 1-2, you may assign the defender 1 tractor beam token.

upgrades.name: R3 Astromech
upgrades.rulesText: Once per round, when attacking with a primary weapon, you may cancel 1 of your [Focus] results during the "Modify Attack Dice" step to assign 1 evade token to your ship.

upgrades.name: Vectored Thrusters
upgrades.rulesText: Your action bar gains the [Barrel Roll] action icon.

upgrades.name: Tail Gunner
upgrades.rulesText: When attacking from your rear-facing auxiliary firing arc, reduce the defender's agility by 1 (to a minimum of "0").

upgrades.name: Fearlessness
upgrades.rulesText: When attacking, if you are inside the defender's firing arc at Range 1 and the defender is inside your firing arc, you may add 1 [Hit] result to your roll.

upgrades.name: IG-88D
upgrades.rulesText: You have the pilot ability of each friendly ship with the IG-2000 Upgrade card (in addition to your own pilot ability).

upgrades.name: Latts Razzi
upgrades.rulesText: When defending, you may remove 1 stress token from the attacker to add 1 [Evade] result to your roll.

upgrades.name: Ketsu Onyo
upgrades.rulesText: At the start of the End phase, you may choose 1 enemy ship inside your firing arc at Range 1-2. That ship does not remove its tractor beam tokens.

upgrades.name: Seismic Torpedo
upgrades.rulesText: Action: Discard this card to choose an obstacle at Range 1-2 and inside your primary firing arc. Each ship at Range 1 of the obstacle rolls 1 attack die and suffers any damage ([Hit]) and critical damage ([Critical Hit]) rolled. Then remove the obstacle.

upgrades.name: Rigged Cargo Chute
upgrades.rulesText: Action: Discard this card to drop one cargo token.

upgrades.name: Gyroscopic Targeting
upgrades.rulesText: At the end of the Combat phase, if you executed a 3-, 4-, or 5-speed maneuver that round, you may rotate your mobile firing arc.

upgrades.name: Black Market Slicer Tools
upgrades.rulesText: Action: Choose a stressed enemy ship at Range 1-2 and roll 1 attack die. On a [Hit] or [Critical Hit] result, remove 1 stress token and deal it 1 facedown Damage card.

upgrades.name: Sabine's Masterpiece
upgrades.rulesText: Your upgrade bar gains the [Crew] and [Illicit] upgrade icons.

upgrades.name: Kylo Ren
upgrades.rulesText: Action: Assign the "I'll Show You the Dark Side" Condition card to an enemy ship at Range 1-3.

upgrades.name: Unkar Plutt
upgrades.rulesText: After executing a maneuver that causes you to overlap an enemy ship, you may suffer 1 damage to perform 1 free action.

upgrades.name: Kylo Ren's Shuttle
upgrades.rulesText: At the end of the Combat phase, choose an unstressed enemy ship at Range 1-2. The owner must assign a stress token to it or assign a stress token to another ship at Range 1-2 of you that that player controls.

upgrades.name: A Score to Settle
upgrades.rulesText:
During setup, before the "Place Forces" step, choose 1 enemy ship and assign the "A Debt to Pay" Condition card to it.

When attacking a ship that has the "A Debt to Pay" Condition card, you may change 1 [Focus] result to a [Critical Hit] result.

upgrades.name: Jyn Erso
upgrades.rulesText: Action: Choose 1 friendly ship at Range 1-2. Assign 1 focus token to that ship for each enemy ship inside your firing arc at Range 1-3. You cannot assign more than 3 tokens in this way.

upgrades.name: Cassian Andor
upgrades.rulesText: At the end of the Planning phase, you may choose an enemy ship at Range 1-2. Guess aloud that ship's bearing and speed, then look at its dial. If you are correct, you may rotate your dial to another maneuver.

upgrades.name: Adaptive Ailerons
upgrades.rulesText: Immediately before you reveal your dial, if you are not stressed, you must execute a white ([Bank Left] 1), ([Straight] 1), or ([Bank Right] 1) maneuver.

upgrades.name: Pivot Wing (Attack)
upgrades.rulesText:
Increase your agility value by 1.

After you execute a maneuver, you may flip this card.

upgrades.name: Pivot Wing (Landing)
upgrades.rulesText:
When you reveal a (0 [Stop]) maneuver, you may rotate your ship 180°.

After you execute a maneuver, you may flip this card.

upgrades.name: Smuggling Compartment
upgrades.rulesText:
Your upgrade bar gains the [Illicit] upgrade icon.

You may equip 1 additional Modification upgrade that costs 3 or fewer squad points.

upgrades.name: Burnout SLAM
upgrades.rulesText:
Your action bar gains the [SLAM] action icon.

After you perform a SLAM action, discard this card.

upgrades.name: Rey
upgrades.rulesText: At the start of the End phase, you may place 1 of your ship's focus tokens on this card. At the start of the Combat phase, you may assign 1 of those tokens to your ship.

upgrades.name: Finn
upgrades.rulesText: When attacking with a primary weapon or defending, if the enemy ship is inside your firing arc, you may add 1 blank result to your roll.

upgrades.name: Snap Shot
upgrades.rulesText:
After an enemy ship executes a maneuver, you may perform this attack against that ship.

Attack: Attack 1 ship. You cannot modify your attack dice and cannot attack again this phase.

upgrades.name: M9-G8
upgrades.rulesText:
When a ship you have locked is attacking, you may choose 1 attack die. The attacker must reroll that die.

You can acquire target locks on other friendly ships.

upgrades.name: Hotshot Co-pilot
upgrades.rulesText:
When attacking with a primary weapon, the defender must spend 1 focus token if able.

When defending, the attacker must spend 1 focus token if able.

upgrades.name: Trick Shot
upgrades.rulesText: When attacking, if the attack is obstructed, you may roll 1 additional attack die.

upgrades.name: EMP Device
upgrades.rulesText: During the Combat phase, instead of performing any attacks, you may discard this card to assign 2 ion tokens to each ship at Range 1.

upgrades.name: Captured TIE
upgrades.rulesText: Enemy ships with a pilot skill value lower than yours cannot declare you as the target of an attack. After you perform an attack or when you are the only remaining friendly ship in play, discard this card.

upgrades.name: Captain Rex
upgrades.rulesText: After you perform an attack that does not hit, you may assign 1 focus token to your ship.

upgrades.name: General Hux
upgrades.rulesText: Action: Choose up to 3 friendly ships at Range 1-2. Assign 1 focus token to each of those ships and assign the "Fanatical Devotion" Condition card to 1 of them. Then receive 1 stress token.

upgrades.name: Operations Specialist
upgrades.rulesText: After a friendly ship at Range 1-2 performs an attack that does not hit, you may assign 1 focus token to a friendly ship at Range 1-3 of the attacker.

upgrades.name: Hyperwave Comm Scanner
upgrades.rulesText:
At the start of the "Place Forces" step, you may choose to treat your pilot skill value as "0", "6", or "12" until the end of the step.

During setup, after another friendly ship is placed at Range 1-2, you may assign 1 focus or evade token to it.

upgrades.name: Bodhi Rook
upgrades.rulesText: When you acquire a target lock, you can lock onto an enemy ship at Range 1-3 of any friendly ship.

upgrades.name: Baze Malbus
upgrades.rulesText: After you perform an attack that does not hit, you may immediately perform a primary weapon attack against a different ship. You cannot perform another attack this round.

upgrades.name: Inspiring Recruit
upgrades.rulesText: Once per round, when a friendly ship at Range 1-2 removes a stress token, it may remove 1 additional stress token.

upgrades.name: Scavenger Crane
upgrades.rulesText: After a ship at Range 1-2 is destroyed, you may choose a discarded [Torpedo], [Missile], [Bomb], [Cannon], [Turret], or Modification Upgrade card that was equipped to your ship and flip it faceup. Then roll 1 attack die. On a blank result, discard Scavenger Crane.

upgrades.name: Spacetug Tractor Array
upgrades.rulesText: Action: Choose a ship inside your firing arc at Range 1 and assign a tractor beam token to it. If it is a friendly ship, resolve the effect of the tractor beam token a though it were an enemy ship.

upgrades.name: Swarm Leader
upgrades.rulesText: When performing a primary weapon attack, choose up to 2 other friendly ships that have the defender inside their firing arcs at Range 1-3. Remove 1 evade token from each chosen ship to roll 1 additional attack die for each token removed.

upgrades.name: Lightweight Frame
upgrades.rulesText:
When defending, after rolling defense dice, if there are more attack dice than defense dice, roll 1 additional defense die.

You cannot equip this card if your agility value is "3" or higher.

upgrades.name: Expertise
upgrades.rulesText: When attacking, if you are not stressed, you may change all of your [Focus] results to [Hit] results.

upgrades.name: Bistan
upgrades.rulesText: When attacking at Range 1-2, you may change 1 of your [Hit] results to a [Critical Hit] result.

upgrades.name: Heavy Laser Turret
upgrades.rulesText: Attack (energy): Spend 2 energy from this card to perform this attack against 1 ship (even a ship outside of your firing arc).

upgrades.name: Cikatro Vizago
upgrades.rulesText: At the start of the End phase, you may discard this card to replace a faceup [Illicit] or [Cargo] Upgrade card you have equipped with another Upgrade card of the same type of equal or fewer squad points.

upgrades.name: Azmorigan
upgrades.rulesText: At the start of the End phase, you may spend 1 energy to replace a faceup [Crew] or [Team] Upgrade card you have equipped with another Upgrade card of the same type of equal or fewer squad points.

upgrades.name: Merchant One
upgrades.rulesText: Your upgrade bar gains 1 additional [Crew] upgrade icon and 1 additional [Team] upgrade icon and loses 1 [Cargo] upgrade icon.

upgrades.name: "Light Scyk" Interceptor
upgrades.rulesText: All Damage cards dealt to you are dealt faceup. You may treat all bank maneuvers ([Bank Left] or [Bank Right]) as green maneuvers. You cannot equip Modification upgrades.

upgrades.name: BoShek
upgrades.rulesText: When a ship you are touching activates, you may look at its chosen maneuver. If you do, its owner must rotate the dial to an adjacent maneuver. The ship can reveal and execute that maneuver even while stressed.

upgrades.name: Broken Horn
upgrades.rulesText: When defending, if you have a reinforce token, you may add 1 additional [Evade] result. If you do, after defending, discard your reinforce token.

upgrades.name: Insatiable Worrt
upgrades.rulesText: After your perform the recover action, gain 3 energy.

upgrades.name: Supercharged Power Cells
upgrades.rulesText: When attacking, you may discard this card to roll 2 additional attack dice.
