upgrades.name: Quick-release Cargo Locks
upgrades.rulesText: At the end of the Activation phase, you may discard this card to place 1 container token.

upgrades.name: Pulsed Ray Shield
upgrades.rulesText: During the End phase, you may receive 1 ion token to recover 1 shield (up to your shield value). You can equip this card only if your shield value is "1".

upgrades.name: ARC Caster
upgrades.rulesText:
Attack: Attack 1 ship. If this attack hits, you must choose 1 other ship at Range 1 of the defender to suffer 1 damage.

Then flip this card.

upgrades.name: ARC Caster (Recharging)
upgrades.rulesText: At the start of the Combat phase, you may receive a weapons disabled token to flip this card.

upgrades.name: Unguided Rockets
upgrades.rulesText:
Attack (focus): Attack 1 ship.

Your attack dice can be modified only by spending a focus token for its standard effect.

upgrades.name: Havoc
upgrades.rulesText:
Your upgrade bar gains the [System] and [Salvaged Astromech] upgrade icons and loses the [Crew] upgrade icon.

You cannot equip non-unique [Salvaged Astromech] Upgrade cards.

upgrades.name: Synced Turret
upgrades.rulesText:
Attack (target lock): Attack 1 ship (even a ship outside your firing arc).

If the defender is inside your primary firing arc, you may reroll a number of attack dice up to your primary weapon value.

upgrades.name: Wookiee Commandos
upgrades.rulesText: When attacking, you may reroll your [Focus] results.

upgrades.name: Jabba the Hutt
upgrades.rulesText: When you equip this card, place 1 illicit token on each [Illicit] Upgrade card in your squad. When you are instructed to discard an Upgrade card, you may discard 1 illicit token on that card instead.

upgrades.name: Intensity
upgrades.rulesText: After you perform a boost or barrel roll action, you may assign 1 focus or evade token to your ship. If you do, flip this card.

upgrades.name: Intensity (Exhausted)
upgrades.rulesText: At the end of the Combat phase, you may spend 1 focus or evade token to flip this card.

upgrades.name: Vaksai
upgrades.rulesText:
The squad point cost of each of your equipped upgrades is reduced by 1 (to a minimum of 0).

You may equip up to 3 different Modification upgrades.

upgrades.name: StarViper Mk.II
upgrades.rulesText:
You may equip up to 2 different Title upgrades.

When performing a barrel roll action, you must use the ([Bank Left] 1) or ([Bank Right] 1) template instead of the ([Straight] 1) template.

upgrades.name: IG-RM Thug Droids
upgrades.rulesText: When attacking, you may change 1 of your [Hit] results to a [Critical Hit] result.

upgrades.name: Selflessness
upgrades.rulesText: When a friendly ship at Range 1 is hit by an attack, you may discard this card to suffer all uncanceled [Hit] results instead of the target ship.

upgrades.name: Breach Specialist
upgrades.rulesText: When you are dealt a faceup Damage card, you may spend 1 reinforce token to flip it facedown (without resolving its effect). If you do, until the end of the round, when you are dealt a faceup Damage card, flip it facedown (without resolving its effect).

upgrades.name: Bomblet Generator
upgrades.rulesText:
When you reveal your maneuver, you may drop 1 bomblet token.

This token detonates at the end of the Activation phase.

upgrades.name: Cad Bane
upgrades.rulesText: Your upgrade bar gains the [Bomb] upgrade icon. Once per round, when an enemy ship rolls attack dice due to a friendly bomb detonating, you may choose any number of [Focus] and blank results. It must reroll those results.

upgrades.name: Minefield Mapper
upgrades.rulesText: During setup, after the "Place Forces" step, you may discard any number of your equipped [Bomb] Upgrade cards. Place all corresponding bomb tokens in the play area beyond Range 3 of enemy ships.

upgrades.name: R4-E1
upgrades.rulesText: You can perform actions on your [Torpedo] and [Bomb] Upgrade cards even if you are stressed. After you perform an action in this way, you may discard this card to remove 1 stress token from your ship.

upgrades.name: Cruise Missiles
upgrades.rulesText:
Attack (Target Lock): Discard this card to perform this attack.

You may roll additional attack dice equal to the speed of the maneuver you executed this round, to a maximum of 4 additional dice.

upgrades.name: Ion Dischargers
upgrades.rulesText: After you receive an ion token, you may choose an enemy ship at Range 1. If you do, remove that ion token. Then that ship may choose to receive 1 ion token. If it does, discard this card.

upgrades.name: Harpoon Missiles
upgrades.rulesText:
Attack (target lock): Discard this card to perform this attack.

If this attack hits, after the attack resolves, assign the "Harpooned" Condition to the defender.

upgrades.name: Xg-1 Assault Configuration
upgrades.rulesText:
Your upgrade bar gains 2 [Cannon] upgrade icons.

You may perform attacks with [Cannon] secondary weapons that cost 2 or fewer squad points even while you have a weapons disabled token.

upgrades.name: Enforcer
upgrades.rulesText: After defending, if the attacker is inside your bullseye firing arc, it receives 1 stress token.

upgrades.name: Ghost
upgrades.rulesText:
Equip the Phantom II title card to a friendly Sheathipede-class shuttle and dock it to this ship.

After you execute a maneuver, you may deploy it from your rear guides.

upgrades.name: Phantom II
upgrades.rulesText:
While you are docked, the Ghost can perform primary weapon attacks from its special firing arc.

While you are docked, at the end of the Activation phase, the Ghost may perform a free coordinate action.

upgrades.name: Ordnance Silos
upgrades.rulesText: When you equip this card, place 3 ordnance tokens on each other equipped [Bomb] Upgrade card. When you are instructed to discard an Upgrade card, you may discard 1 ordnance token on that card instead.

upgrades.name: Trajectory Simulator
upgrades.rulesText: You may launch bombs using the ([Straight] 5) template instead of dropping them. You cannot launch bombs with the "Action:" header in this way.

upgrades.name: First Order Vanguard
upgrades.rulesText:
When attacking, if the defender is the only ship in your firing arc at Range 1-3, you may reroll 1 attack die.

When defending, you may discard this card to reroll all of your defense dice.

upgrades.name: Os-1 Arsenal Loadout
upgrades.rulesText:
Your upgrade bar gains the [Torpedo] and [Missile] upgrade icons.

You may perform attacks with [Torpedo] and [Missile] secondary weapons against ships you have locked even while you have a weapons disabled token.

upgrades.name: Jamming Beam
upgrades.rulesText:
Attack: Attack 1 ship.

If this attack hits, assign the defender 1 jam token. Then cancel all dice results.

upgrades.name: Linked Battery
upgrades.rulesText: When attacking with a primary weapon or [Cannon] seconday weapon, you may reroll 1 attack die.

upgrades.name: Saturation Salvo
upgrades.rulesText: After you perform an attack with a [Torpedo] or [Missile] secondary weapon that does not hit, each ship at Range 1 of the defender with an agility value lower than the squad point cost of the [Torpedo] or [Missile] Upgrade card must roll 1 attack die and suffer any damage ([Hit]) or critical damage ([Critical Hit]) rolled.

upgrades.name: Contraband Cybernetics
upgrades.rulesText: When you become the active ship during the Activation phase, you may discard this card and receive 1 stress token. If you do, until the end of the round, you may perform actions and red maneuvers even while you are stressed.

upgrades.name: Maul
upgrades.rulesText:
When attacking, if you are not stressed, you may receive any number of stress tokens to reroll that many attack dice.

After performing an attack that hits, you may remove 1 of your stress tokens.

upgrades.name: Courier Droid
upgrades.rulesText: At the start of the "Place Forces" step, you may choose to treat your pilot skill value as "0" or "8" until the end of the step.

upgrades.name: "Chopper"
upgrades.rulesText: Action: Discard 1 other equipped Upgrade card to recover 1 shield.

upgrades.name: Flight-Assist Astromech
upgrades.rulesText:
You cannot attack ships outside your firing arc.

After you execute a maneuver, if you did not overlap a ship or obstacle and there are no enemy ships inside your firing arc at Range 1-3, you may perform a free boost or barrel roll action.

upgrades.name: Advanced Optics
upgrades.rulesText:
You cannot have more than 1 focus token.

During the End phase, do not remove an unused focus token from your ship.

upgrades.name: Crossfire Formation
upgrades.rulesText: When defending, if there is at least 1 other friendly Resistance ship at Range 1-2 of the attacker, you may add one [Focus] result to your roll.

upgrades.name: Deflective Plating
upgrades.rulesText: When a friendly bomb token detonates, you may choose not to suffer its effects. If you do, roll an attack die. on a [Hit] result, discard this card.

upgrades.name: Debris Gambit
upgrades.rulesText: Action: Assign 1 evade token to your ship for each obstacle at Range 1, to a maximum of 2 evade tokens.

upgrades.name: Threat Tracker
upgrades.rulesText: When an enemy ship inside your firing arc at Range 1-2 becomes the active ship during the Combat phase, you may spend your target lock on that ship to perform a free boost or barrel roll action if that action is on your action bar.

upgrades.name: Scrambler Missiles
upgrades.rulesText:
Attack (target lock): Discard this card to perform this attack.

If this attack hits, the defender and each other ship at Range 1 receive 1 jam token. Then cancel all results.

upgrades.name: R5-TK
upgrades.rulesText:
You can acquire target locks on friendly ships.

You can attack friendly ships.

upgrades.name: Targeting Scrambler
upgrades.rulesText: At the start of the Planning phase, you may receive a weapons disabled token to choose a ship at Range 1-3 and assign it the "Scrambled" Condition.

upgrades.name: Saw Gerrera
upgrades.rulesText: When attacking, you may suffer 1 damage to change all of your [Focus] results to [Critical Hit] results.

upgrades.name: Director Krennic
upgrades.rulesText: During setup, before the "Place Forces" step, assign the "Optimized Prototype" Condition to a friendly Galactic Empire ship with 3 or fewer shields.

upgrades.name: Death Troopers
upgrades.rulesText: After another friendly ship at Range 1 becomes the defender, if you are inside the attacker's firing arc at Range 1-3, the attacker receives 1 stress token.

upgrades.name: Magva Yarro
upgrades.rulesText: After defending, you may acquire a target lock on the attacker.

upgrades.name: Renegade Refit
upgrades.rulesText:
You may equip up to 2 different Modification upgrades.

The squad point cost of your equipped [Elite] upgrades is reduced by 1 (to a minimum of 0).

upgrades.name: Servomotor S-foils (Attack)
upgrades.rulesText:
Your action bar gains [Barrel Roll].

If you are not stressed, when you reveal a ([Turn Left] 3) or (3 [Turn Right]) maneuver, you may treat it as a red ([Tallon Roll Left] 3) or ([Tallon Roll Right] 3) in the same direction.

At the start of the Activation phase, you may flip this card.

upgrades.name: Servomotor S-foils (Closed)
upgrades.rulesText:
Reduce your primary attack value by 1. Your action bar gains [Boost]. Treat your ([Bank Left] 2) and ([Bank Right] 2) maneuvers as green.

At the start of the Activation phase, you may flip this card.

upgrades.name: Advanced Ailerons
upgrades.rulesText:
Treat your ([Bank Left] 3) and ([Bank Right] 3) maneuvers as white.

Immediately before you reveal your dial, if you are not stressed, you must execute a white ([Bank Left] 1), ([Straight] 1), or ([Bank Right] 1) maneuver.

upgrades.name: Tactical Officer
upgrades.rulesText: Your action bar gains [Coordinate].

upgrades.name: ISB Slicer
upgrades.rulesText: After you perform a jam action against an enemy ship, you may choose a ship at Range 1 of that ship that is not jammed and assign it 1 jam token.

upgrades.name: Multi-spectral Camouflage
upgrades.rulesText: After you receive a red target lock token, if you have only 1 red target lock token, roll 1 defense die. On an [Evade] result, remove 1 red target lock token.

upgrades.name: Thrust Corrector
upgrades.rulesText: When defending, if you have 3 or fewer stress tokens, you may receive 1 stress token to cancel all of your dice results. If you do, add 1 [Evade] result to your roll. Your dice cannot be modified again during this attack. You can equip this Upgrade only if your hull value is "4" or lower.

upgrades.name: I'll Show You the Dark Side
upgrades.rulesText:
When this card is assigned, if it is not already in play, the player who assigned it searches the Damage deck for 1 Damage card with the Pilot trait and may place it faceup on this card. Then shuffle the damage deck.

When you suffer critical damage during an attack, you are instead dealt the chosen faceup Damage card.

When there is no Damage card on this card, remove it.

upgrades.name: Fanatical Devotion
upgrades.rulesText:
When defending, you cannot spend focus tokens.

When attacking, if you spend a focus token to change all [Focus] results to [Hit] results, set aside the first [Focus] result that you change. The set-aside [Hit] result cannot be canceled by defense dice, but the defender may cancel [Critical Hit] results before it.

During the End phase, remove this card.

upgrades.name: Suppressive Fire
upgrades.rulesText:
When attacking a ship other than "Captain Rex," roll 1 fewer attack die.

When you declare an attack targeting "Captain Rex" or when "Captain Rex" is destroyed, remove this card.

At the end of the Combat phase, if "Captain Rex" did not perform an attack this phase, remove this card.

upgrades.name: A Debt to Pay
upgrades.rulesText: When attacking a ship that has the "A Score to Settle" Upgrade card, you may change 1 [Focus] result to a [Critical Hit] result.

upgrades.name: Mimicked
upgrades.rulesText:
"Thweek" is treated as having your pilot ability.

"Thweek" cannot apply a Condition card by using your pilot ability.

"Thweek" does not lose your pilot ability if you are destroyed.

upgrades.name: Shadowed
upgrades.rulesText:
"Thweek" is treated as having the pilot skill value you had after setup.

This pilot skill value of "Thweek" does not change if your pilot skill value changes or you are destroyed.

upgrades.name: Harpooned!
upgrades.rulesText:
When you are hit by an attack, if there is at least 1 uncancelled [Critical Hit] result, each other ship at range 1 suffers 1 damage. Then discard this card and receive one facedown Damage card.

When you are destroyed, each ship at Range 1 of you suffers 1 damage.

Action: Discard this card. Then roll 1 attack die. On a [Hit] or [Critical Hit] result, suffer 1 damage.

upgrades.name: Rattled
upgrades.rulesText:
When you suffer damage from a bomb, you suffer 1 additional critical damage. Then, remove this card.

Action: Roll 1 attack die. On a [Focus] or [Hit] result, remove this card.

upgrades.name: Scrambled
upgrades.rulesText:
When attacking a ship at Range 1 that is equipped with the "Targeting Scrambler" upgrade, you cannot modify your attack dice.

At the end of the Combat phase, remove this card.

upgrades.name: Optimized Prototype
upgrades.rulesText:
Increase your shield value by 1.

Once per round, when performing a primary weapon attack, you may spend 1 die result to remove 1 shield from the defender.

After you perform a primary weapon attack, a friendly ship at Range 1-2 equipped with the "Director Krennic" Upgrade card may acquire a target lock on the defender.

damageCards.name: Blinded Pilot
damageCards.text: You cannot perform attacks. After your next opportunity to attack (even if there was no target for an attack), flip this card facedown.

damageCards.name: Console Fire
damageCards.text: At the start of each Combat phase, roll 1 attack die. On a Hit result, suffer 1 damage. Action: Flip this card facedown.

damageCards.name: Damaged Cockpit
damageCards.text: Starting the round after you receive this card, treat your pilot skill value as "0".

damageCards.name: Damaged Engine
damageCards.text: Treat all turn maneuvers (left turn or right turn) as red maneuvers.

damageCards.name: Damaged Sensor Array
damageCards.text: You cannot perform any actions except actions listed on Damage cards. Action: Roll 1 attack die. On a Hit or Critical Hit result, flip this card facedown.

damageCards.name: Direct Hit!
damageCards.text: This card counts as 2 DAMAGE against your hull.

damageCards.name: Loose Stabilizer
damageCards.text: After you execute a white maneuver, receive 1 stress token. Action: Flip this card facedown.

damageCards.name: Major Explosion
damageCards.text: Roll 1 attack die. On a Hit result, suffer 1 critical damage. Then flip this card facedown.

damageCards.name: Major Hull Breach
damageCards.text: Starting the round after you receive this card, all Damage cards dealt to you are dealt faceup. Action: Flip this card facedown.

damageCards.name: Shaken Pilot
damageCards.text: During the Planning phase, you cannot be assigned straight maneuvers. When you reveal a maneuver, flip this card facedown.

damageCards.name: Structural Damage
damageCards.text: Reduce your agility value by 1 (to a minimum of "0"). Action: Roll 1 attack die. On a Hit or Critical Hit result, flip this card facedown.

damageCards.name: Stunned Pilot
damageCards.text: After you execute a maneuver, if you are touching another ship or overlapping an obstacle token, suffer 1 damage.

damageCards.name: Thrust Control Fire
damageCards.text: Receive 1 stress token. Then flip this card facedown.

damageCards.name: Weapons Failure
damageCards.text: When attacking, roll 1 fewer attack die. Action: Roll 1 attack die. On a Hit or Critical Hit result, flip this card facedown.
